title: Lead Scoring Model
summary: Developed a lead-scoring pipeline using logistic regression to recommend top 10 leads per cohort

title: BI Pipeline
summary: Developed a BI pipeline for 2 analytics dashboards that reduced the monthly BI operating cost by 60% as compared to that of the cheapest available product

title: Risk Classification
summary: Developed, tested and deployed an ML model on taxpayer risk classification using AutoML on Microsoft Azure
